item.title: reSlim Tuber
item.description: A Rest API to build a simple web app for boost to make money on your videos on youtube, vimeo, etc. Not like a video tube as usual, this script is perfectly if you make website for posting a video movie.

item.title: reSlim
item.description:
reSlim is Lightweight, Fast, Secure, Simple, Scalable, Flexible and Powerful rest api framework.
reSlim is based on Slim Framework version 3.
